meanings.definition: Bodhisattvas: Enlightened beings who postpone their own nirvana to help others achieve enlightenment.
meanings.sent1: In the temple, the statues of bodhisattvas stood tall and serene.
meanings.sent2: Many people seek inspiration from the teachings of bodhisattvas.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended her dolls were bodhisattvas on a mission to spread kindness.
meanings.sent4: The bodhisattvas in the ancient stories were like guiding stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The legend of the bodhisattvas' selfless sacrifice touched the hearts of all who heard it.
